14 // SID class
15 class SIDsound
16 {
17 public:
18  SIDsound(unsigned int model, unsigned int chnlDisableMask);
19  virtual ~SIDsound();
20  void reset();
21  void setReplayFreq() {
22  calcEnvelopeTable();
23  };
24  void setModel(unsigned int model);
25  void setFrequency(unsigned int sid_frequency);
26  void setSampleRate(unsigned int sampleRate_);
27  void calcEnvelopeTable();
28  unsigned char read(unsigned int adr);
29  void write(unsigned int adr, unsigned char byte);
30  void calcSamples(short *buf, long count);
31  void enableDisableChannel(unsigned int ch, bool enabled) {
32  voice[ch].disabled = !enabled;
33  }
34 
35 private:
36 
37  // SIDsound waveforms
38  enum {
39  WAVE_NONE, WAVE_TRI, WAVE_SAW, WAVE_TRISAW, WAVE_PULSE,
40  WAVE_TRIPULSE, WAVE_SAWPULSE, WAVE_TRISAWPULSE, WAVE_NOISE
41  };
42  // Envelope Genarator states
43  enum {
44  EG_FROZEN, EG_ATTACK, EG_DECAY, EG_RELEASE
45  };
46  // Filter types
47  enum {
48  FILTER_NONE, FILTER_LP, FILTER_BP, FILTER_LPBP, FILTER_HP, FILTER_NOTCH, FILTER_HPBP, FILTER_ALL
49  };
50  // Class for SID voices
51  class SIDVoice {
52  public:
53  int wave; // the selected waveform
54  int egState; // state of the EG
55  SIDVoice *modulatedBy; // the voice that modulates this one
56  SIDVoice *modulatesThis;// the voice that is modulated by this one
57 
58  unsigned int accu; // accumulator of the waveform generator, 8.16 fixed
59  unsigned int accPrev; // previous accu value (for ring modulation)
60  unsigned int add; // added to the accumulator for each sample
61  unsigned int shiftReg; // shift register for noise waveform
62 
63  unsigned short freq; // voice frequency
64  unsigned short pw; // pulse-width value
65 
66  unsigned int envAttackAdd;
67  unsigned int envDecaySub;
68  unsigned int envSustainLevel;
69  unsigned int envReleaseSub;
70  unsigned int envCurrLevel;
71  unsigned int envCounter;
72  unsigned int envExpCounter;
73  unsigned int envCounterCompare;
74 
75  unsigned int gate; // EG gate flag
76  unsigned int ring; // ring modulation flag
77  unsigned int test; // test flag
78  unsigned int filter; // voice filtered flag
79  unsigned int muted; // voice muted flag (only for 3rd voice)
80  bool disabled; // voice disabled
81 
82  // This bit is set for the modulating voice,
83  // not for the modulated one (compared to the real one)
84  unsigned int sync; // sync modulation flag
85  };
86  int volume; // SID Master volume
87  unsigned int sidBaseFreq; // SID base frequency
88  unsigned int sidCyclesPerSampleInt;
89  unsigned int clockDeltaRemainder;
90  int dcMixer; // different for 6581 and 8580 (constant level output for digi)
91  int dcVoice;
92  int dcWave;
93  int dcDigiBlaster;
94  //int extIn;
95  //
96  unsigned int clock();
97  // Wave generator functions
98  inline static int waveTriangle(SIDVoice &v);
99  inline static int waveSaw(SIDVoice &v);
100  inline static int wavePulse(SIDVoice &v);
101  inline static int waveTriSaw(SIDVoice &v);
102  inline static int waveTriPulse(SIDVoice &v);
103  inline static int waveSawPulse(SIDVoice &v);
104  inline static int waveTriSawPulse(SIDVoice &v);
105  inline static int waveNoise(SIDVoice &v);
106  inline static int getWaveSample(SIDVoice &v);
107  inline void updateShiftReg(SIDVoice &v);
108  // Envelope
109  inline int doEnvelopeGenerator(unsigned int cycles, SIDVoice &v);
110  static const unsigned int RateCountPeriod[16]; // Factors for A/D/S/R Timing
111  static const unsigned char envGenDRdivisors[256]; // For exponential approximation of D/R
112  /*static*/ unsigned int masterVolume;
113  // voice array for the 3 channels
114  SIDVoice voice[3];
115  // filter stuff
116  unsigned char filterType; // filter type
117  unsigned int filterCutoff; // SID filter frequency
118  unsigned char filterResonance; // filter resonance (0..15)
119  double cutOffFreq[2048]; // filter cutoff frequency register
120  int resonanceCoeffDiv1024; // filter resonance * 1024
121  int w0; // filter cutoff freq
122  void setResonance();
123  void setFilterCutoff();
124  int filterOutput(unsigned int cycles, int Vi);
125  int Vhp; // highpass
126  int Vbp; // bandpass
127  int Vlp; // lowpass
128  //
129  unsigned char lastByteWritten;// Last value written to the SID
130  int model_;
131  bool enableDigiBlaster;
132  unsigned int sampleRate;
133 };
134 
135 /*
136  Wave outputs
137 */
138 inline int SIDsound::waveTriangle(SIDVoice &v)
139 {
140  unsigned int msb = (v.ring ? v.accu ^ v.modulatedBy->accu : v.accu)
141  & 0x8000000;
142  // triangle wave 15 bit only
143  return ((msb ? ~v.accu : v.accu) >> 15) & 0xFFE;
144 }
145 
146 inline int SIDsound::waveSaw(SIDVoice &v)
147 {
148  return (v.accu >> 16) & 0xFFF;
149 }
150 
151 inline int SIDsound::wavePulse(SIDVoice &v)
152 {
153  // square wave starts high
154  return (v.test | ((v.accu >> 16) >= v.pw ? 0xFFF : 0x000));
155 }
156 
157 inline int SIDsound::waveTriSaw(SIDVoice &v)
158 {
159  unsigned int sm = (waveTriangle(v)) & (waveSaw(v));
160  return (sm>>1) & (sm<<1);
161 }
162 
163 inline int SIDsound::waveTriPulse(SIDVoice &v)
164 {
165  unsigned int sm = (waveTriangle(v)) & (wavePulse(v));
166  return (sm>>1) & (sm<<1);
167 }
168 
169 inline int SIDsound::waveSawPulse(SIDVoice &v)
170 {
171  return (waveSaw(v)) & (wavePulse(v));
172 }
173 
174 inline int SIDsound::waveTriSawPulse(SIDVoice &v)
175 {
176  unsigned int sm = (waveTriangle(v)) & (waveSaw(v)) & (wavePulse(v));
177  return (sm>>1) & (sm<<1);
178 }
179 
180 #endif
